group_1.textRight: The smell definitely feels stronger than before...

group_1.textLeft: I assume that by 'smell,' you mean a sort of @incident-related feeling?
Like the power you feel from Devils, for example. @Is it unconnected to that?

group_1.textRight: Yeah... It's not like power, exactly.
It's this feeling that something bad's about to @happen. Like I've got this awful, queasy feeling in my @chest.

group_1.textLeft: And you've been feeling it from here the @whole time...
We can't know what it really is until we go inside...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
By the way, what's the Grand Shrine that @Shizuka mentioned...?

group_1.textLeft: The Grand Shrine is where our gods are venerated.
Like Lord Kyūbē, who grants our wishes,
and all the Diviners who fought for the Land of the @Rising Sun before us.

group_1.textRight: Have you ever gone inside?

group_1.textLeft: Nope...
Trainee dancers have been summoned in,
but I don't think most people have been there.
Though it was designated as an emergency shelter, @we've never had an emergency until today...

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: We've arrived. Once you enter the shrine building, @there should be a path down.
Charu?

group_1.textRight: Uwegh... It's so gross...

group_1.textLeft: Wait, are you all right?!

group_1.textRight: Sorry... But I think I'll be able to get used to it in a @minute...
I don't understand... What is this...? @...It's malice, probably.

group_1.textLeft: Malice?

group_1.textRight: You get this gross feeling when you see a person @doing something bad, right?
It sorta feels like that...

group_1.textLeft: If it's not reacting to the Devil, perhaps there's @someone that you need to arrest...?
We might find Mikoshiba down there too, @not just the Devil...

group_1.textRight: ...Alright. I'm okay now.

group_1.textLeft: Then, let's start descending...?

group_1.textRight: Okay...

group_1.textLeft: There it is, as soon as we reached the stairway.

group_1.textRight: We did it. This is the right place...
How far down should we go...?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know... This is my first time in here too, @after all...

group_1.textRight: So there's a lot of things that even the head Tokime family doesn't know...

group_1.textLeft: Really, the only one who knows everything is Mikoshiba...

group_1.textRight: Our enemy might be manipulating Granny, too,
so I bet it's real tough.

group_1.textLeft: True, we must be prepared...
If we die, everything will be buried in darkness...
It's our duty to go back alive and expose everything under the sun's rays.

group_1.textRight: ...I can see a light.

group_1.textLeft: *Inhale*...

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:102600:lipSynch_1]Strong malice...

group_1.textLeft: ...and a Devil's strong power...

group_1.textRight: ......[wait:0.8][chara:102600:lipSynch_1]What is this place...?

group_1.textLeft: Such a magnificent place...built without anyone knowing...
Mikoshiba...

group_1.textCenter: Little girls... Ye did well, figuring out I was here...

group_1.textRight: Charu seems to have felt the smell for a long time, though.

group_1.textLeft: My, how pesky.
It was a blunder on my part not to kill ye earlier.

group_1.textRight: Don't you dare talk so casually about killing her.
You're going to tell us everything that's happened @until now! Not a single omission!

group_1.textLeft: Thou needn't order me to. I shall tell thee as a last parting gift.
Come, now. Why not come and play with the Devil to liven up the conversation?

group_1.textCenter: 衆倒令專　方界諸聞　若持後佛

group_1.textRight: Bury them for me, o Devil...!
And then it will be their parents' turn!
